description: Try this easy-to-make mango sorbet and raspberry ice-cream cake which can be made ahead for a refreshing no-fuss dessert.
name: Mango & Raspberry Ice-Cream Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Turn ice-cream cake onto a serving platter and remove baking paper. Top with mango, extra raspberries, cream and reserved biscuits, then drizzle with honey and serve.
